Literature.Title: Arginine and tryptophan-rich dendritic antimicrobial peptides that disrupt membranes for bacterial infection in vivo
Literature.Author: Yang Y, Yu Z, Ba Z, Ouyang X, Yang P, Zhang J, Wang Y, Liu Y, Yang T, Zhao Y, Wu X, Zhong C, Liu H, Zhang Y, Gou S, Ni J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>256 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:50% Cell death=>128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM)
